channel.title: New TOS
channel.description:
As it seems, the new TOS terms were enforced to avoid legal pursuit by Jagex by making people agree that they no longer take a part in any of their games, thus being exempt from the 'you enforce TOS breaking' claim. Yet this is quite ironic being that there is still an existent 'Talk about Runescape' board.
So either remove the board or remove the TOS, because the new terms will obviously have no effect as long as that board is there.

item.title: New TOS
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

jme:

my cat phoned me and said he doesn’t understand the exact reason moparisthebest is doing this.

It’s pretty self-explanatory, or at least I thought so. Basically in jagex’s latest case against impsoft, jagex claims that impsoft caused jagex to lose players (and therefore money) because impsoft:

cause(d) the players to exceed the license provided in the Terms and Conditions associated with the Software (runescape).

Basically, Jagex claims monetary damages against impsoft because impsoft encouraged users to break jagex’s TOS. (which I think is complete bullshit, but IANAL)

Therefore, if one of the provisions of this site’s TOS says you can’t be subject to Jagex’s TOS to use this site, then there is no way anything on this site is encouraging you to break that TOS (because you aren’t subject to it). Understand? Good, now I’m going to lock this thread because the discussion is over.

Read full topic

item.title: New TOS
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:28, topic:329710”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=426091.msg3130167#msg3130167 date=1266412210]

[quote author=Lothy link=topic=426091.msg3130165#msg3130165 date=1266411983]

[quote author=Speljohan link=topic=426091.msg3130163#msg3130163 date=1266411673]

Unless you ban everyone who ever posted in runescape section i oppose this TOS and will cause a revolution

I’m immune to bans.
[/quote]DOWN WITH THE CLASSES, IT IS TIME FOR A COMMUNIST REVOLUTION

Come to Australia. We have a lot of misguided idealists in power at the moment, much to the dismay of the public. We’re mimicking China’s censorship regime, so we’re getting there.
It’s a party in the PRA!
[/quote]Stop complaining about australia all the time when it is fact the whole world will censor everything eventually.

Not true. Righteous countries like America deplore censorship of the internet. And Europe is probably even more anti-censorship that is government-enforced.
[/quote]Xcept Sweden, the Netherlands, Germany, UK and USA are all considering it, Sweden having already done it and Netherlands + Germany are close.

Just accept it, it’s a fact. If they can make more money off us they will.

Pretty sure that they’ll filter things that are illegal, IF they introduce compulsory filtering; not things that are grey, such as the peaceful pill euthanasia handbook (which is refused classification). I’m pretty sure I read about censorship in Sweden, and I’m pretty sure that everybody onboard volunteered to take part.[/quote]The people had no say in it, the “representatives” decided, ie fucking faggotry phony democracy.

Read full topic

item.title: New TOS
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

Moparisthebest:

That’s perfectly legal. It is protected by the right to free speech, I can ask you to do anything on a website, it doesn’t mean you have to do it and it isn’t illegal for me to do so.

what if I use free speech to distribute the clients code, but use a melody to jazz it up.

Read full topic

Unless you ban everyone who ever posted in runescape section i oppose this TOS and will cause a revolution

I’m immune to bans.
[/quote]DOWN WITH THE CLASSES, IT IS TIME FOR A COMMUNIST REVOLUTION

Come to Australia. We have a lot of misguided idealists in power at the moment, much to the dismay of the public. We’re mimicking China’s censorship regime, so we’re getting there.
It’s a party in the PRA!
[/quote]Stop complaining about australia all the time when it is fact the whole world will censor everything eventually.

Not true. Righteous countries like America deplore censorship of the internet. And Europe is probably even more anti-censorship that is government-enforced.
[/quote]Xcept Sweden, the Netherlands, Germany, UK and USA are all considering it, Sweden having already done it and Netherlands + Germany are close.

Just accept it, it’s a fact. If they can make more money off us they will.[/quote]
Pretty sure that they’ll filter things that are illegal, IF they introduce compulsory filtering; not things that are grey, such as the peaceful pill euthanasia handbook (which is refused classification). I’m pretty sure I read about censorship in Sweden, and I’m pretty sure that everybody onboard volunteered to take part.

[quote=“Newty, post:27, topic:329710”][quote author=Lothy link=topic=426091.msg3130161#msg3130161 date=1266411568]

Unless you ban everyone who ever posted in runescape section i oppose this TOS and will cause a revolution

I’m immune to bans.
[/quote]DOWN WITH THE CLASSES, IT IS TIME FOR A COMMUNIST REVOLUTION

Come to Australia. We have a lot of misguided idealists in power at the moment, much to the dismay of the public. We’re mimicking China’s censorship regime, so we’re getting there.
It’s a party in the PRA!

One day your going to go missing and we’re never going to see you again.[/quote]
Not likely. I’ll budget for a VPN tunneling service just to stick it to the man.

/offtopic… I’m strongly considering making a topic about this; it needs to be discussed.

item.title: New TOS
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:24, topic:329710”][quote author=Lothy link=topic=426091.msg3130161#msg3130161 date=1266411568]

[quote author=Speljohan link=topic=426091.msg3130120#msg3130120 date=1266407691]

Unless you ban everyone who ever posted in runescape section i oppose this TOS and will cause a revolution

I’m immune to bans.
[/quote]DOWN WITH THE CLASSES, IT IS TIME FOR A COMMUNIST REVOLUTION

Come to Australia. We have a lot of misguided idealists in power at the moment, much to the dismay of the public. We’re mimicking China’s censorship regime, so we’re getting there.
It’s a party in the PRA!
[/quote]Stop complaining about australia all the time when it is fact the whole world will censor everything eventually.[/quote]
Not true. Righteous countries like America deplore censorship of the internet. And Europe is probably even more anti-censorship that is government-enforced.
It’s one thing for people to opt in, but another thing completely to force it on them at a level with which they can’t interfere.

On topic: The TOS is great. We expect that all players who play Runescape will either discontinue use of these forums, in line with our new expectations, or avoid explicit confirmation of their choice to play Jagex games.
You shouldn’t say; we certainly won’t ask.

Read full topic

item.title: New TOS
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Unhandled:

Do we have to start using SWIM in the rs section then? Because things like “Post your account” make it clear beyond a reasonable doubt that you play the game.

Maybe it’s a another person’s account or maybe it used to be your account from when you played runescape. I won’t ask, you don’t have to tell.

Yz85Racer:

The TOS wouldn’t even hold up in a court, would it?

Not an issue.

Read full topic
